text: Pavetta rubentifolia is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Cameroon. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests and subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==Sources== * Cheek. M. 2004. Pavetta rubentifolia. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 August 2007. title: Pavetta rubentifolia
